item.description:
Member Meetup - No Organizer at this run.

A number of runners have been requesting a weekend meetup but I am busy with Team in Training and Jenny has reduced her running due to an injury so I decided to put up a Morning Meetup but be aware that no Organizer will be present. If runners wish to connect sign up so other know you will be there.

In the past I've been reluctant to place unattended runs because a number of people RSVP but never should up so it wasn't fair to someone that traveled to the area expecting to run with a group.

I would also recommend crossing Skiff Street and heading North on the trail. Though I have never run towards New Haven I have heard from a few sources it goes through some questionable areas and that was confirmed with a newspaper article recently where a few 50 year olds were assaulted because they would not give up their bikes to a gang.
item.name: Morning Run
